metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41909 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0. bgp_nlri_parse_flowspec in bgpd/bgp_flowspec.c processes malformed requests with no attributes, leading to a NULL pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41909` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1
frr-pythontools - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1
frr-snmp - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr

criterions.comment: frr package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1').
